/** * Skeleton implementation of {@link HashFunction}, appropriate for non-streaming algorithms. * All the hash computation done using {@linkplain #newHasher()} are delegated to the {@linkplain * #hashBytes(byte[], int, int)} method. * * @author Dimitris Andreou */
